titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to R. C. Hewitt
CWG13945

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
288
March 3d 5
Dr R. C. Hewitt
Chrm Medical Board
Louisville Ky.
Sir

I have the honor to request that your Board will examine Dr Wm E. Scoby touching his qualifications for the position of Surgeon, he having furnished satisfactory Evidence to this Department of his loyalty and good conduct.

By command of the Governor
D, W, Lindsey
Insp & Adj Genl
